title: Ma Cocoute
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Romanian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. In Nov 2013 changed name from Simplicity raw food restaurant and added meat stuff alongside some raw food. Warm atmosphere inspired by the landscapes of Provence, France, with playground for children, wireless internet, both smoking and non smoking sections. Serves coffee and cakes.
